gen:link.msg:message: `DamagesForOwnAccount` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementTechnicalAccountIndemnityInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1EM5_DamagesForOwnAccount')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementTechnicalAccountIndemnityInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1EM5_DamagesForOwnAccount return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementTechnicalAccountIndemnityInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1EM5_ChildrenOfDamagesForOwnAccountDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementTechnicalAccountIndemnityInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1EM5_ChildrenOfDamagesForOwnAccountDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementTechnicalAccountIndemnityInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1EM5_ChildrenOfDamagesForOwnAccountCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementTechnicalAccountIndemnityInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1EM5_ChildrenOfDamagesForOwnAccountCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
